main-section.title: Free your style: dress in feelings!

inspire.title: You inspire us and we want to inspire you too
inspire.text1: Every step of the way, we feel a burning desire to share, teach, and learn. Everything we do is inspired by you - our beloved communities.
inspire.text2: Our mission is to find beauty in every little thing and make the incredible ordinary. This inspires you to find new ways and discover the brightest colors of life.
inspire.text3: We believe in the power of joint creativity. Every project, every idea is the result of our joint work and your uniqueness. Together we create magic.
inspire.text4: Our impressive stories have endured through time because of your passion for the new, your belief in the future, and your willingness to change the world. Our innovation is a response to your needs and desire to see more.

returns.title: Returns
returns.text:
You have the right to cancel this contract within 14 days without giving any reason. The cancellation period is fourteen days from the date on which you or a third party designated by you, excluding the carrier, took possession of the goods.


In order to exercise your right to withdraw, you must notify us in a clear statement of your decision to withdraw. You may use the enclosed model withdrawal form, which is not mandatory.


In order to meet the withdrawal period, it is sufficient to send a notice of exercise of the right of withdrawal before the end of the withdrawal period.


Consequences of Withdrawal


If you cancel this Agreement, we will refund all payments we have received from you, including shipping charges (excluding any additional charges resulting from your selection of a shipping method other than the lowest cost standard shipping method offered by us), immediately and no later than fourteen days from the date we receive notice of your cancellation of this Agreement. For this refund, we will use the same payment method you used for the original transaction, unless otherwise expressly agreed with you; under no circumstances will you be charged for this refund. We may refuse a refund until we receive the goods back or until you provide proof that you have returned the goods, whichever comes first.


You must return or transfer the goods to us immediately and in any event no later than fourteen days from the date you notify us of your cancellation of this agreement. This deadline will be deemed to have been met if you send the product before the fourteen day period expires. You will be liable for any loss of value of the goods only if such loss of value is due to processing of the goods that is not necessary to verify their nature, properties and functioning.
